title: RansomwareasaService
extract: Ransomware as a service (RaaS) is an unusual type of software as a service (SaaS) provided as a vendor platform through the internet. Among the many kinds of software as a service provided by tech vendors, ransomware as a service is different as it represents an offering used by criminals to attack IT systems.
extract_html: Ransomware as a service (RaaS) is an unusual type of software as a service (SaaS) provided as a vendor platform through the internet. Among the many kinds of software as a service provided by tech vendors, ransomware as a service is different as it represents an offering used by criminals to attack IT systems.
